questions.question: What is the measure of a right angle?
questions.explanation: A right angle measures 90 degrees.

questions.question: What is the measure of a straight angle?
questions.explanation: A straight angle measures 180 degrees.

questions.question: What is the measure of an acute angle?
questions.explanation: An acute angle measures less than 90 degrees.

questions.question: What is the measure of an obtuse angle?
options: More than 90 degrees but less than 180 degrees
questions.explanation: An obtuse angle measures more than 90 degrees but less than 180 degrees.

questions.question: What is the measure of a reflex angle?
options: More than 180 degrees but less than 360 degrees
questions.explanation: A reflex angle measures more than 180 degrees but less than 360 degrees.

questions.question: What is the measure of a complete angle?
questions.explanation: A complete angle measures 360 degrees.

questions.question: What is the measure of the angle formed by the hands of a clock at 3 o'clock?
questions.explanation: The angle formed by the hands of a clock at 3 o'clock is 90 degrees.
